channel.title: Keyboard on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Keyboard on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Rambling about â€” Keyboards
item.description: I use an IQUNIX Magi65 keyboard at home, and absolutely love it. I didn’t get the Pro version, as I don’t really need a dial or media keys, and I preferred the smaller size anyways. The only real criticism I noticed in reviews was that the keyboard is pretty heavy, but this turned out to be a good thing for me. I don’t want to carry the thing around with me, and I love the solidity as I type. The typing experience is fantastic.
